IoT套件

The Thingsboard documentation can help you set up Thingsboard, learn about the platform and get your IoT projects running on Thingsboard.

Thingsboard Overview Getting started Thingsboard Installation

Platform Features

  • Working with device attributes - Describes device attributes feature and related use cases.
  • Working with telemetry data - Describes telemetry data collection feature and related use cases.
  • Using RPC capabilities - Provides overview of Thingsboard RPC functionality.
  • Rule engine - Describes rule engine features and capabilities.
  • Data visualization - Covers data visualization capabilities: Widgets & Dashboards.

Integrations cookbook

Contains receipts and tips on third-party integrations.

  • AWS IoT - Describes how to persist and visualize data from AWS IoT using Thingsboard.
  • Apache Spark - Describes how to use Apache Spark for analysis of device data collected by Thingsboard.
  • Sigfox - SigFox IoT data collection and visualization using Thingsboard.

Security

Contains description of available device authentication options.

Samples

Contains a list of hardware platform specific samples.

API

Contains a list of device connectivity and server-side platform specific API.

IoT Gateway

Contains comprehensive documentation about Thingsboard IoT Gateway.

Video Tutorials

The Thingsboard Youtube channel contains useful video tutorials that cover various platform features.
